name: Camera Lens - Fisheye Lens

positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Macro Lens Effect, close-up, magnification, detail, shallow depth

positive_prompt: {pos_prompt} Prime Lens Effect, fixed focal, sharp, high quality, fast aperture
